basic.description:
Analytic and empirical evaluation of the performance of software systems. Performance modeling. Experimental design and statistical techniques for empirical performance analysis.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Performance Analysis

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    CISC324 and CISC327
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from CISC437; SOFT437.
